column2: NO!!!!!! The long-time chef of Cafe BBR left recently and the food is just not the same! I have been a customer of CBBR for years
column3: however it had been about a year since I had been. My husband and I recently stopped in to grab some lunch
column4: and I immediately noticed something drastically changed when I tasted the food. I asked the server why the food tasted different
column5: and she confirmed that there was a new chef.
